citation: Proclamation under the Terrorism (Restrictions on Bail and Parole) Act 2018 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Terrorism (Restrictions on Bail and Parole) Act 2018

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Terrorism (Restrictions on Bail and Parole) Act 2018 fix 14 December 2018 as the day on which the provisions of that Act commence.

3 December 2018

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

ELISE ARCHER

Minister for Justice

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 12 December 2018

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice.
